lead_paragraph: Against a backdrop of the iconic five rings, legendary swimmer Michael Phelps sat on a United States Olympic Committee stage at a March media event in Los Angeles, telling reporters why he had arrived fashionably late.

headline.main: Under Armour Leads Olympic Marketing Shake-Up After 'Rule 40' Changes
headline.print_headline: Under Armour Leads Olympic Marketing Shake-Up After 'Rule 40' Changes
